3/10/19, 10:57 AM - Hannah Guedenet: I usually whip 2 eggs with a fork and add a little soy sauce and water. Cook that in the cast iron skillet. Take eggs out (cook it flat and then roll when done in the pan). Saut√© some onion and garlic. And carrots in some oil. Then add rice and warm it. Add frozen peas and corn. And soy sauce. Then add back egg.
